Downgrade Node.js back to v8.26 for hipache websocket issue.

In our run.sh, rebase not merge the git pull to update local code.

Additional "Create Application" form validation.

Merge pull request #74 from nikdoof/master

Use repository files over Dockerfile installed versions.

Use repository files over Dockerfile installed versions.

In the instance where a runtime file is updated (run.sh, supervisor.conf) the changes were not being used if the container was restart. The idea here is to use the repository versions of files to avoid needing to recreate the container on these types of changes.

Merge pull request #27 from Delphinator/master

Update hipache atomicly

Update hipache atomicly

The commands issued to redis to update the hipache configuration
were all send one after another. Using a pipeline removes a
race between a request to hipache and the update, where the
client may get an error even if working upstreams are available,
but not yet added to redis again.
